text: "And that," said Zaphod in a voice that would have made an approaching motorist flash his lights in annoyance.

passages.full_quote: "<used>And that," said</used> Harl, "was just the editor."

passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: "Count the hea<used>ds," said Zaphod in a</used> low rasp

passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: "How do you know..." <used>said Zaphod in a voice that would</used> make a Vegan snow lizard feel chilly, "that this is Hotblack Desiato's stuntship?"

passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: "Excuse me," said the owner of the metal hand <used>in a voice that would have made an</used> insect of a more sentimental disposition collapse in tears

passages.fragment: that would have made an approaching motorist flash his lights in annoyance
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: As he came into the light they could see his black and gold uniform on which the buttons were so highly polished that they shone with an intensity <used>that would have made an approaching motorist flash his lights in annoyance</used>
